alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Windham, Tolland and Hartford Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stafford to near East Hartford to Terryville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Bristol, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Wethersfield, Mansfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Windham, Plainfield, Simsbury and Bloomfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and Rhode Island.
